title: Common Phrases: Relationships (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Relationships subcategory within Common Phrases. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: I think there is a special connection between you and me.
cards.romaji: Watashi to anata niwa tokubetsu na go-en ga aru to omoimasu.
cards.japanese: 私とあなたには特別なご縁があると思います。
